titleStmt.title: A proclamation against persons returning from France without passes.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Gilb. Eliot. Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the ninth day of December, and of Our Reign the ninth year, 1697.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
